title: Wire cut in half and connected in parallel

content.question: A length of wire of resistance R is connected across a battery with zero internal resistance. The wire is then cut in half and the two halves are connected in parallel. When the combination is reconnected across the battery, what happens to the resultant power dissipated and the current drawn from the battery?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
